participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, I always seek out new experiences and enjoy sharing my thoughts with others.
participant_1.background: i try various coffees as a hobby. i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry. i am a huge star wars fan.

participant_2.name: Margaret
participant_2.personality: Reflective and ambitious, I often think about my past while dreaming of a more exciting future.
participant_2.background: i've two grown children who never visit. i am a 56 year old woman. i fantasize about taking over the world. i used to be pretty but time has not been kind. i used to be a painter but now i'm a housekeeper.

content.text: Hey! I enjoy poetry ? What about you?
